name: InterPrime
long_description:
Manage your money like a Fortune 500 company, whether you are about to IPO or still working in a garage. Dealing with financial institutions is painful. Yet itâ€™s critical to keep your corporate cash safe & earning a reasonable rate of return. InterPrime helps you do that.

one_liner: Safe & Secure Cash Management for Businesses
